subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: On TBS, Chip Caray’s play-by-play of the Yankees’ 8-4 win in Game 3 on Sunday night was packed with errors and silly strategy, enough to give me agita.
snippet: On TBS, Chip Caray’s play-by-play of the Yankees’ 8-4 win in Game 3 on Sunday night was packed with errors and silly strategy, enough to give me agita.
